meanings.sent1: She was retying her shoelaces to make sure they stayed in place.
meanings.sent2: After the rope came loose, he quickly started retying it to secure the boat.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel kept retying the knot on the acorn, determined to get it just right.
meanings.sent4: As the magician performed his trick, it felt like he was retying reality itself.
meanings.sent5: The image of her retying the ribbon in her hair stuck in his mind.

meanings.sent1: His retying of the knot was so precise that it impressed everyone watching.
meanings.sent2: The retying of the bow on the gift added a nice finishing touch.
meanings.sent3: The retying of the friendship bracelet symbolized their bond growing stronger.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the retying of the thread represented a fresh start for the character.
meanings.sent5: The retying of the old fishing net brought back memories of days by the sea.
